page.title: 12THE STATION continued
page.content: With the lack of goods trains the goods-yard was later demolished.A car salesroom on the goods-yard site was replaced in the 1970's by a Kwiksave supermarket. In its heyday the railway brought an influx of visitors into the area from the Midlands and Northwest England. The number of visitors has reduced and the number of trains stopping at the railway station is as follows: Weekdays_Holyhead-Chester 25 Sundays _Holyhead-Chester 9 Weekdays_Chester-Holyhead 20 Sundays _Chester-Holyhead 7
